txt.en: 'Greetings. I am Tharnion, captain of the guard here at Calembel. I hear that you have offered your assistance to our fair city, and I am inclined to take you up on that.\n\n'Orcs have taken up residence at Roz Lad창r, near the foothills west of the city. Their might was broken during the war, but having so many gather in one place again will only spell trouble. I bid you do what you can to reduce their numbers.'
Tharnion is concerned about the growing number of Orcs who have started to gather west of the city of Calembel.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs at Roz Lad창r, their camp in western Lamedon.
You should let Tharnion know that you greatly lessened the Orc population at Roz Lad창r.\n\nTharnion is in Calembel.
A growing Orc presence at Roz Lad창r, near the foothills of the nearby mountains near Calembel promises to become a threat.
'You return with good news, I hope? Excellent! You have our thanks.'
